description: Secure file system operations for reading, writing, and managing files and directories

tools.description: Read the contents of a file. Returns text content by default, or base64 for binary files.

path.description: The absolute or relative path to the file to read

encoding.description: File encoding: 'utf8' (default) or 'base64' for binary files

tools.description: Write content to a file. Creates the file if it doesn't exist, overwrites if it does.

path.description: The absolute or relative path to the file to write

content.description: The content to write to the file

create_dirs.description: If true, create parent directories if they don't exist. Defaults to false.

tools.description: List the contents of a directory with file metadata (name, size, type, modified date).

path.description: The absolute or relative path to the directory to list

recursive.description: If true, list contents recursively. Defaults to false.

path.description: The absolute or relative path of the directory to create

recursive.description: If true, create parent directories as needed. Defaults to true.

path.description: The absolute or relative path to delete

recursive.description: If true and path is a directory, delete contents recursively. Defaults to false.

tools.description: Move or rename a file or directory.

source.description: The source path of the file or directory to move

tools.description: Search for files matching a glob pattern (e.g., '*.txt', '**/*.json').

path.description: The directory path to search in

recursive.description: If true, search recursively in subdirectories. Defaults to true.

tools.description: Get detailed metadata about a file or directory (size, permissions, dates, type).

path.description: The absolute or relative path to get info for
